resources.string: I Know You\'re Seeing In Black And White So I\'ll Paint You A Clear Blue Sky
I Fell Off My Pink Cloud With A Thud
The Clouds Are Always Improvising, But The Culprit Is The Wind
Clouds, THey Make a Painting Out Of The Sky
Listen To The Rhythm Of The Falling Rain
The Nicest Thing About The Rain Is That It Always Stops Eventually
When I Am Silent I Have Thunder Hidden Inside
The Snow Is Sparkling Like A Million Little Suns.
Sometimes Hope Gets Lost In A Fog
